icecream.title: Vanilla Dream
icecream.description: Indulge in the creamy delight of vanilla ice cream that will satisfy your sweet cravings.

icecream.title: Choco Explosion
icecream.description: Experience the explosion of rich chocolate flavors in every bite of this decadent ice cream.

icecream.title: Cookies and Cream
icecream.description: Indulge in the classic combination of chocolate cookies crumbled into creamy vanilla ice cream.

icecream.title: Rainbow Swirl
icecream.description: Experience a burst of colors and flavors with this delightful rainbow-inspired ice cream.

icecream.title: Caramel Delight
icecream.description: Indulge in the smooth and luscious caramel flavor that will melt in your mouth.
